content.rendered:
We want to address your questions and concerns quickly and effectively.  View the Whom to Contact Chart for assistance.

Staff Directory

Search for faculty and staff by typing ONE of these options in the box below: first name, last name or email. Tip: If you don’t know how to spell the name of the person you are looking for, try typing the first few letters of their first or last name and click ‘Go’.

 

Administrative Contacts

Dr. Michael Patton, Superintendent of Schools, (518) 583-4708

Dr. Lisa Cutting, Assistant Superintendent of Curriculum, Instruction and Assessment, (518) 583-4474

David L’Hommedieu, Assistant Superintendent of Information Technology & Operational Innovation, (518) 584-3228

Bobby Yusko, Assistant Superintendent for Business, (518) 693-1450

TBD, Director of Program and Budget Integration, (518) 693-1449

Jerry Keenan, Director of Transportation, (518) 587-4545

Stacey Moulton, Director of Pupil Services, (518) 583-4715

Dr. Joseph Greco, Director of Personnel Development, (518) 583-4713

Eric Bush, Director of Food Service, (518) 583-4704

Dr. Michele Whitley, Director of K-12 Humanities & Elementary Instruction, (518) 583-4725

Dr. Danielle Bouton-Wales, Director of K-12 STEM & Secondary Instruction,   (518) 583-4725

Abigail Adams-Snell, Director of Assessment, Accountability & Improvement,  (518) 583-4725

John Thuener, Director of Facilities and Operations, (518) 587-6365

Maura Manny, Director of Community Outreach and Communications, (518) 583-4786

Valerie ElSawi, District Registrar, (518) 583-4789

Shelli Saupe, Tax Collector, (518) 693-1455

Whom to contact and when

We want to address your questions and concerns quickly and effectively. In the event of a question or concern, please contact the staff/faculty member who is most likely involved first. If your question or concern remains unsolved, please proceed to the next level.

Academic Programs 

Teacher → Department Head/School Counselor→ Assistant Principal→ Principal→ Curriculum Director→ Assistant Superintendent for Curriculum, Instruction and Assessment→ Superintendent→ Board of Education

Athletics

Coach→ Athletics Director→ Principal→ Assistant Superintendent for Curriculum, Instruction and Assessment→ Superintendent→ Board of Education

Behavior/Discipline

Teacher→ Assistant Principal→ Principal→ Assistant Superintendent for Curriculum, Instruction and Assessment→ Superintendent→ Board of Education

Building & Facility Use

Building Main Office→ Asst. Director of Facilities→ Assistant Superintendent of IT & Operational Innovation→ Superintendent→ Board of Education

Dignity for all Students Act (DASA)

Dignity for all Students Act (DASA) Bullying Reporting Form

Building DASA Coordinator→ Assistant Principal→ Principal→ District DASA Coordinator→ Superintendent→ Board of Education

Food Services

School Lunch Director→ Assistant Superintendent for Business→ Superintendent→ Board of Education

Special Education

Teacher/Case Manager→ Department Head→ Assistant Principal→ Principal→ CSE Chairperson→ Director of Pupil Services→ Superintendent→ Board of Education

Transportation

Transportation Main Office→ Assistant Transportation Supervisor→ Director of Transportation→ Assistant Superintendent for Business→ Superintendent→ Board of Education
